Title: In Search of a Nation
Director: Prakash Angdembe, Samten Bhutia, Pralhad Gurung
Actors: Baboo Bogati, Hemanta Budathoki, Aruna Karki, Meena Koirala
Plot: 2014, according to the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees there are 51.2 million people forcibly displaced across the world. Among them, 120,000 refugees are from Bhutan.
